trans-unit.source: Represents a query on an XML document defined by an XPath 1.0 expression.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en spørring på et XML-dokument som er definert av et uttrykk som XPath 1.0.

trans-unit.source: An XPathMessageFilter uses an XPath expression to determine whether an XML document contains specific elements, attributes, text, or other XML syntactic constructs.
trans-unit.target: En XPathMessageFilter bruker et XPath-uttrykk til å fastslå om en XML-dokumentet inneholder bestemte elementer, attributter, tekst eller andre tvetydig XML-skjemaopprettelser.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an application uses an XPathMessageFilter at an endpoint to query the contents of a SOAP message and then takes the appropriate action based on the results of that query.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis en applikasjon bruker en XPathMessageFilter på en endepunktet til å spørre innholdet i en SOAP-melding og har de nødvendige handlingene som er basert på resultatet av denne spørringen.

trans-unit.source: A queuing process, for example, may use an XPath query to check the priority element of a known header to decide whether to move a message to the front of the queue.
trans-unit.target: En queuing prosess, for eksempel kan bruke en XPath-spørring til å kontrollere elementet prioritet for en kjent toppteksten for å bestemme om du skal flytte en melding til starten av køen.

trans-unit.source: The XML Path Language (XPath) provides a language for addressing parts of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: XML Path Language (XPath) gir et språk for å løse delene av et XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: The primary syntactic construct in XPath is an expression that defines how to traverse the logical structure of an XML document and address or identify an XPath data type.
trans-unit.target: Den primære tvetydig konstruksjonen i XPath er et uttrykk som definerer hvordan du går over den logiske strukturen i en XML-dokumentet og adressen eller identifisere en XPath-datatype.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, XPath implementations evaluate an expression against the structure of an XML document to yield one of the four basic XPath data types: strings, numbers, Booleans, and node sets.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt XPath implementeringer evaluere et uttrykk mot strukturen i et XML-dokument til kapasitet én av de fire grunnleggende XPath-datatypene: strenger, tall, boolske og noden angir.

trans-unit.source: They also support functions that convert an XPath data type to a string, number, or Boolean data type.
trans-unit.target: De støtter også funksjoner som konverterer en XPath-datatype til en streng, antall eller boolsk datatype.

trans-unit.source: If a method expects one of these three data types, the result of the expression evaluation is implicitly converted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en metode forventer en av disse tre datatypene, er resultatet av Uttrykksevaluering av implisitt konverteres.

trans-unit.source: Note that these three data types cannot be converted to a node-set type.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at disse tre datatypene ikke kan konverteres til typen nodesett.

trans-unit.source: The XML Path language is fully described in the [W3C XML Path Language 1.0 specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96179).
trans-unit.target: Språket som XML-banen er fullstendig beskrevet i den [W3C XML Path Language 1.0-spesifikasjonen](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96179).

trans-unit.source: Numbers in XPath expressions are expressed as double-precision 64-bit values.
trans-unit.target: Tallene i XPath-uttrykk er uttrykt som dobbel presisjon 64-biters verdier.

trans-unit.source: Therefore XPath expressions that involve testing numbers with many significant digits can return incorrect results due to floating point precision issues.
trans-unit.target: Derfor kan XPath-uttrykk som involverer testing tall mange signifikante sifre returnere feil resultater på grunn av flyttall presisjon.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][XML Path Language (XPath) Version 1.0, section 3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96180).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][XML Path Language (XPath) versjon 1.0, delen 3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96180).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> class that matches all well-formed XML documents.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> klassen som samsvarer med alle velformet XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter> class with an empty XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>klassen med et tomt XPath-uttrykk.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: An empty XPath expression always matches a well-formed XML document, so all objects satisfy the criteria of a filter defined by an empty XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Et tomt XPath-uttrykk alltid samsvarer med et velformet XML-dokument, slik at alle objekter som oppfyller kravene til et filter som er definert av et tomt XPath-uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> class using an XPath expression to specify query criteria for the filter.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av et XPath-uttrykk til å angi spørringsvilkår for filteret.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when there are no namespaces to manage.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren når det finnes ingen navneområder til å administrere.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.Namespaces%2A> property by using the default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>, so the XPath expression has access to the function library that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> defines.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>tilordnet av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.Namespaces%2A>ved hjelp av standard <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>, så XPath-uttrykket har tilgang til funksjonen biblioteket som den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>definerer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.Namespaces%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains an XPath 1.0 expression.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder et uttrykk som XPath 1.0.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: xpath is .
trans-unit.target: xpathis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> class by reading a streamed XPath with the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> klassen ved å lese en flyt XPath med den angitte XML-leseren.

trans-unit.source: It is assumed that the reader is positioned at the start element of the serialized `XPathMessageFilter`.
trans-unit.target: Antas det at leseren er plassert i startelementet av den serialiserte `XPathMessageFilter`.

trans-unit.source: The name of the element is not validated before reading.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet er ikke validert før lesing.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the reader is positioned immediately after the serialized `XPathMessageFilter`.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, leseren er plassert rett etter den serialiserte `XPathMessageFilter`.

trans-unit.source: The constructor also automatically initializes the namespace manager by resolving all prefixes in the XPath expression as they were bound in the reader.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren initialiserer også automatisk navneområdet manager ved å løse alle prefiksene i XPath-uttrykket som de er bundet i leseren.

trans-unit.source: This method can access any XML that can be created by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.WriteXPathTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan få tilgang til alle XML kan opprettes av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.WriteXPathTo%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.WriteXPathTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the streamed XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>lese flyt XPath-uttrykket.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> class using the specified XPath expression and namespace manager.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitte XPath-uttrykk og navneområdet manager.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when XPath uses prefixes not defined in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>, or when you want to use your own <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren når XPath bruker prefikser som ikke er definert i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>, eller når du vil bruke din egen <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> can be created and passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>kan opprettes og sendes til denne metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>

trans-unit.source: If the instances provided to this method are <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> implementations, it is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis forekomster som er angitt for denne metoden <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>implementeringer, tilsvarer det kaller den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>

trans-unit.source: An XPath 1.0 expression.
trans-unit.target: Et 1.0 XPath-uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> that resolves any namespace prefixes in `xpath`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>som løser noen prefikser for navneområde i `xpath`.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: xpath is .
trans-unit.target: xpathis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> class using a specified XPath expression and <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av et angitt XPath-uttrykk og <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The XPath 1.0 expression for the filter.
trans-unit.target: 1.0 XPath-uttrykket for filteret.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"></xref> that resolves any namespace prefixes, custom functions or variables in `xpath`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"> </xref> som løser noen prefikser for navneområde, egendefinerte funksjoner eller variabler i `xpath`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> class by reading in a streamed XPath with a specified XML reader and using the specified namespace manager.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> klassen ved å lese i flyt XPath med en angitt XML-leseren og ved hjelp av angitte navneområdet manager.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you want to use your own <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> to define the filter.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren når du vil bruke din egen <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>og <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>til å definere filteret.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: It is assumed that the reader is positioned at the start element of the serialized `XPathMessageFilter`.
trans-unit.target: Antas det at leseren er plassert i startelementet av den serialiserte `XPathMessageFilter`.

trans-unit.source: The name of the element is not validated before reading.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet er ikke validert før lesing.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the reader is positioned immediately after the serialized `XPathMessageFilter`.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, leseren er plassert rett etter den serialiserte `XPathMessageFilter`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the streamed XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>lese flyt XPath-uttrykket.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> that resolves any namespace prefixes in the XPath expression from `reader`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>som løser noen prefikser for navneområde i XPath-uttrykket fra `reader`.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: This can also be an <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"></xref> that defines custom functions or variables.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan også være en <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"> </xref> som definerer egendefinerte funksjoner eller variabler.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: reader is not positioned on the starting element.
trans-unit.target: readerer ikke plassert i det første elementet.

trans-unit.source: An invalid dialect attribute was read: it was not XPath.
trans-unit.target: Et ugyldig dialect attributt ble lest: det var ikke XPath.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> class by reading a streamed XPath with a specified XML reader and using the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"></xref> to resolve namespaces, custom functions, and variables.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> klassen ved lesing av en flyt XPath med en angitt XML-leseren og bruke den <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"> </xref> å løse navneområder, egendefinerte funksjoner og variabler.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you want to use your own <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> to define the filter.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren når du vil bruke din egen <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>og <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>til å definere filteret.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: It is assumed that the reader is positioned at the start element of the serialized `XPathMessageFilter`.
trans-unit.target: Antas det at leseren er plassert i startelementet av den serialiserte `XPathMessageFilter`.

trans-unit.source: The name of the element is not validated before reading.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet er ikke validert før lesing.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the reader is positioned immediately after the serialized `XPathMessageFilter`.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, leseren er plassert rett etter den serialiserte `XPathMessageFilter`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the streamed XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>lese flyt XPath-uttrykket.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"></xref> that resolves any namespace prefixes, functions, and variables in the XPath expression from `reader`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext"> </xref> som løser noen prefikser for navneområde funksjoner og variabler i XPath-uttrykket fra `reader`.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a specified message satisfies the criteria of the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer om en angitt melding oppfyller kriteriene for XPath-filteret.

trans-unit.source: This form is not allowed to access the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjemaet er ikke tillatt å få tilgang til meldingsteksten.

trans-unit.source: Use the Match method to match elements from the body.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Match-metoden til å samsvare med elementer fra meldingsteksten.

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown by this method if the engine attempts to access the message body in order to evaluate the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak av denne metoden hvis motoren prøver å få tilgang til meldingsteksten for å evaluere XPath-uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: This helps to ensure that the filter engine does not access the body stream.
trans-unit.target: Dette bidrar til å sikre at filter-motor ikke tilgang body dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> to test.
trans-unit.target: Det <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>skal testes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> satisfies the filter criteria; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>oppfyller filtervilkårene; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: message is .
trans-unit.target: messageis .

trans-unit.source: The XPath evaluation attempted to examine the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: XPath-evalueringen forsøkte å undersøke i meldingsteksten.

trans-unit.source: A compiler error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en kompileringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a buffered message satisfies the query criteria of the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en bufret melding oppfyller spørringen kriterier for XPath-filteret.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.Match%2A> method when a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> is available.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne overbelastning av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.Match%2A>metoden når en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter.Match%2A>

trans-unit.source: This form is allowed to examine the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjemaet er tillatt å undersøke i meldingsteksten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> to test.
trans-unit.target: Det <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>skal testes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Match satisfies the filter criteria; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis samsvaret oppfyller filtervilkår; Ellers<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: message is .
trans-unit.target: messageis .

trans-unit.source: A compiler error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en kompileringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the XML document provided by the specified optimized XPath navigator satisfies the query criteria of the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om XML-dokumentet som er angitt av den angitte optimalisert XPath-navigatoren oppfyller spørringen kriterier for XPath-filteret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator> class extends the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class with methods that run queries more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator>klassen utvider den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>klasse metoder som kjører spørringer mer effektivt.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator"></xref> that provides data to test.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator"> </xref> som inneholder dataene som skal testes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data from the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator"></xref> satisfies the filter criteria; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene fra den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.SeekableXPathNavigator"> </xref> oppfyller filtervilkårene; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: navigator is .
trans-unit.target: navigatoris .

trans-unit.source: A compiler error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en kompileringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the filter over the specified XPath navigator.
trans-unit.target: Evaluerer filteret over angitte XPath navigatoren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> that provides data to test.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> som inneholder dataene som skal testes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data from the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> satisfies the filter criteria; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene fra den <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> oppfyller filtervilkår; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ellers.

trans-unit.source: navigator is .
trans-unit.target: navigatoris .

trans-unit.source: A compiler error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en kompileringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Gets the manager that resolves namespace prefixes in the XPath expression that defines the filter.
trans-unit.target: Henter manager som løser prefikser for navneområde i XPath-uttrykk som definerer filteret.

trans-unit.source: The Namespaces property can also be an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> that defines custom function or variables.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen navneområder kan også skyldes en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>som definerer egendefinerte funksjonen eller variabler.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>

trans-unit.source: Do not modify the namespace manager instance once the filter is created.
trans-unit.target: Ikke endre navneområdet manager forekomsten når filteret er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> for the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>for gjeldende <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of nodes that should be looked at during filter evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimum antall noder som skal slås på under evaluering av filteret.

trans-unit.source: Some filters can be extremely expensive to evaluate or are very long running.
trans-unit.target: Noen filtre kan være svært kostbar ikke evaluere eller er svært lange kjører.

trans-unit.source: Because filters operate on XML documents, the best way to set computational limits is to specify the maximum number of nodes that should be looked at during a filter evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Fordi filtre fungerer på XML-dokumenter, er den beste måten å angi databehandling grenser til å angi maksimalt antall noder som skal slås på under evaluering av et filter.

trans-unit.source: The quota is initially set to <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Kvoten er satt til <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of nodes that should be looked at during filter evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall noder som skal slås på under evaluering av filteret.

trans-unit.source: The quota is zero or negative.
trans-unit.target: Kvoten er null eller negativ.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema for the current XML document.
trans-unit.target: Henter skjemaet for gjeldende XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that represents the current document.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>som representerer gjeldende dokument.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Reads the current XML node.
trans-unit.target: Viser gjeldende XML-node.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> used to read the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>brukes til å lese XML-dokumentet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: reader encountered an empty element.
trans-unit.target: readerDet oppstod et tomt element.

trans-unit.source: Content of a node is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i en node er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Writes a node using writer.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en node med writer .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> used to write the node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>brukes til å skrive noden.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes the current instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref> with an XPath obtained from a specified XML reader using a specified namespace manager.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref> med en XPath hentet fra et angitt XML-leseren ved hjelp av en angitt navneområde manager.

trans-unit.source: The namespace manager instance can be an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> that is used to resolve functions and variables.
trans-unit.target: Navneområdet manager forekomsten kan være en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>som brukes til å løse funksjoner og variabler.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> used to deserialize the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>brukes til å deserialisere XPath-filteret.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> used to manage the namespaces being read from.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>brukes til å administrere navneområdene blir lest fra.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of XML schema used to serialize the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Henter av XML-skjemaet som brukes til å serialisere XPath-filteret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmLSchemaSet> that contains the cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmLSchemaSet>som inneholder hurtigbufferen for XML-skjema definition language (XSD) skjemaer.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmLSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmLSchemaType> used to serialize the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmLSchemaType>brukes til å serialisere XPath-filteret.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmLSchemaType>

trans-unit.source: schemas is .
trans-unit.target: schemasis .

trans-unit.source: An explicit interface implementation that gets the current schema.
trans-unit.target: Implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt som henter gjeldende skjema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that represents the current document.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>som representerer gjeldende dokument.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: An explicit interface implementation that reads the current XML node.
trans-unit.target: Implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt som leser gjeldende XML-node.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> used to read the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>brukes til å lese XML-dokumentet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An explicit interface implementation that writes an XML node using writer.
trans-unit.target: Implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt som skriver en XML-node med writer .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> used to write the node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>brukes til å skrive noden.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Compacts the XPath filter, which releases all unused memory.
trans-unit.target: Komprimerer XPath-filteret som frigir alle ledig minne.

trans-unit.source: This operation is similar to the resizing of an array so that it has no unused elements.
trans-unit.target: Denne operasjonen er lik endring av en matrise slik at den har ingen ubrukte elementer.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the XPath filter to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Serializes XPath-filteret til <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The `writer` must be in the *Start* state.
trans-unit.target: Den `writer` må være i den *Start* tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis unntak et.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> used to serialize the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>brukes til å serialisere XPath-filteret.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> used to resolve any namespace conflict for the XPath filter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>brukes til å løse eventuelle navneområdekonflikt i forbindelse med XPath-filteret.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: Writes the XML XPath element with a specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: Skriver XML XPath-element med en angitt XML-skriveren.

trans-unit.source: The `writer` must be in the *Start* state.
trans-unit.target: Den `writer` må være i den *Start* tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis unntak et.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> used to write the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>brukes til å skrive den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the XPath XML element.
trans-unit.target: Navneområdeprefikset for XPath XML-elementet.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the XPath XML element.
trans-unit.target: Lokale navnet på XPath XML-elementet.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to associate with the XML element.
trans-unit.target: Navneområde-URI for å knytte til XML-elementet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if namespaces should be serialized out separately as attributes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis navneområder skal serialiseres ut separat som attributtene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: localName is .
trans-unit.target: localNameis .

trans-unit.source: localName has length = 0.
trans-unit.target: localNamehar lengde = 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XPath expression that defines the query criteria for the filter.
trans-unit.target: Henter XPath-uttrykk som definerer spørringsvilkårene for filteret.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression for the filter.
trans-unit.target: XPath-uttrykket for filteret.
